full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSANGS MCHOG MDOR BSDUS RLUNG SPRIN CHAR GLOG GI BDAG PO RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,YUL LHA GZHI BDAG KLU GNYAN SA BDAG CHEN PO 'GA' ZHAG LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BSANGS MCHOG MDOR BSDUS 'DI YANG STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA ^ 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN MO'I NANG BLON BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG AE PH'U WANG GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR PHEN SHING, ,YUN SHING, YUS SHING, ,LI'I SHING, ZHES PA RLUNG SPRIN CHAR GLOG GI BDAG PO RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD BYED TSUL ZHIG GOS ZHES BSKUL BAR BRTEN, ,^ SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG THA SHAL BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO SBYAR BA'I YI GE'I 'DU BYED BLO BZANG YI DAM BGYIS PA DZA YANTU, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
